root.text: Have new ideas in the field of Basic Science? Well, this is certainly the place for you! Present your ideas in Physics or any of your field of interest (science and technical). Are you a very curious learner? Come on, we have a place for you too! Present the ideas that stimulated the curiosity in you! Your love towards Science and 7 minutes of talk is all required for you to walk away with the Prizes!

text: Any other fields related to physics or basic science
Send your paper (IEEE format in PDF form) to phyzquantapsgkriya@gmail.com
Last date for sending the abstract is 13/02/2019, Shortlisted participants will be intimated within 15/02/2019.
The papers will be judged based on objectives, methodology, findings and analysis, conclusion, implication/application/limitation.
Decision of the judges would be final.
The paper should be brief containing at most 300 words and citing the references is mandatory.
Best few teams will be selected and would be invited to present.
The teams have to submit their Hard copy of the paper on that day of the event
The presentation (of the shortlisted participants) should last a maximum of 7 minutes. This will be followed by a 3 minutes Q & A session.
